narrative.narrative: MasAir is a cargo airline which is based at Mexico City and is a part of LAN Airlines which owns 39.5% of them. It started having an interest in MasAir starting in December 2000 when a 25% stake was purchased. As of late 2014 it had one 767-300 on lease from LAN. It has also used DC-8's in the past. Its secondary hubs are Los Angeles and Miami in the US and flies to places like Guadalajara,Mexico, Bogota and Medellin in Columbia and Quito in Ecuador.
